title: Rajputana Diamond and Ruby Kada - A Touch of Royalty
materials: meticulously crafted. Showcasing brilliant cut diamonds and a vibrant square-cut Ruby center stone. Finished with the signature Hyderabadi polish for an enduring luster.
features: This Kada features an intricate openwork design, reminiscent of Mughal artistry, adorned with numerous shimmering diamonds. The central Ruby, framed by delicate goldwork, adds a regal touch. The band showcases a repeating chevron pattern, each facet meticulously set with diamonds, adding depth and brilliance.
colors: The warm yellow hue of the 22K gold beautifully complements the fiery red of the ruby and the dazzling white of the diamonds
creating a rich and captivating contrast.
occasions: and family celebrations. A statement piece that will elevate any outfit.
description: This Kada is a testament to timeless elegance and impeccable craftsmanship. The combination of premium materials and exquisite design makes it a valuable heirloom piece. Own a piece of South Indian heritage blended with modern sensibilities.
